tool_description: Convert numbers to words, text to speech, numbers to speech, speech to text and much more.
name: All Purpose Complex Converter
title: All Purpose Complex Converter

api_list.name: Convert Number To Speech| Provide Any Integer Number
api_list.description: Converting any integer number to Speech

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description:
Select Language , By default  ( en-us ) is supported, 
Hit GET Languages Endpoint to get a list of all supported languages.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://all-purpose-complex-converter.p.rapidapi.com/numbers_to_speech/12345345483453456434354131/en/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-purpose-complex-converter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://all-purpose-complex-converter.p.rapidapi.com/numbers_to_speech/{number}/{lang}/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-purpose-complex-converter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Convert Text To Speech || Provide Any Text
api_list.url: https://all-purpose-complex-converter.p.rapidapi.com/text_to_speech/I am using All Purpose Complex Converter API for My Daily Tasks./en/

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description:
Support Both Text and Numbers. 
Can Pass Text Such as (\"any Thing to convert\")
or 
Can Pass Any Number such as 1029383833384474
required_parameters.default: I am using All Purpose Complex Converter API for My Daily Tasks.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description:
Select Language , By default  ( en-us ) is supported, 
Hit GET Languages Endpoint to get a list of all supported languages.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://all-purpose-complex-converter.p.rapidapi.com/text_to_speech/I am using All Purpose Complex Converter API for My Daily Tasks./en/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-purpose-complex-converter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

api_list.name: Convert Numbers To Words | Provide Any Integer Number

optional_parameters.name: to_convert
optional_parameters.description: By Default the number will be converted to cardinal, if you wan to convert it into specific format such as ordinal, ordinal_num, year or currency than you can specify it here.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://all-purpose-complex-converter.p.rapidapi.com/numbers_to_words/2356564546548979878435435453456464/ordinal"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-purpose-complex-converter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://all-purpose-complex-converter.p.rapidapi.com/numbers_to_words/{number}/{to_convert}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-purpose-complex-converter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
